title: Horror Room: Scary Hotel Tycoon
description: Horror Room: Scary Hotel Tycoon is a simulation game where you manage a spine-chilling theme park. Youâ€™ll design terrifying rooms, hire creepy actors, and come up with creative ways to scare visitors. Keep your attractions running smoothly by cleaning, repairing, and maintaining equipment. Track guest feedback to make improvements and aim to become the top fright master in the business!
